price: 98. Zeg: “O, mensen van het boek. Waarom verwerpen jullie de tekenen van Allah, terwijl Allah getuige is van alles wat jullie doen?”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā taʿmalūna
